data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On Friday, 4Th November 2022
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e November 4, 2022, inter alia, has considered and approved the following:

1. Unaudited Standalone Financial Results and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2022 as recommended by the Audit Committee at its meeting held today, November 4, 2022.
